This study design determine whether dose-response relation much trans-C16:1 cis-C16:1 consume much appear plasma . Trans-C16:1 occurs naturally dairy fat milk cheese , cis-C16:1 occurs naturally nut , particularly , macadamia nut , plant call sea buckthorn . The study consist two 9-week phase , minimum 4 week off-study period two phase . Fasting blood drawn baseline ( first day week 1 ) , 3 week , 6 week 9 week ( 4 total blood draw per phase 8 total blood draw 2 phase ) . During phase ask consume increase number vegetable oil capsule , 2 per day first 3 week , 4 per day second 3 week , 8 per day third 3 week . During period take half capsule morning half evening , meal . You randomly assign receive trans-C16:1 cis-C16:1 first phase second phase . The total length study 18 week , include break phase 1 phase 2 ( less 4 week ) . The trans-C16:1 capsule form partially-hydrogenated soybean oil . The cis-C16:1 capsule form sea buckthorn oil .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Inclusion criterion : Age ≥ 18 ≤ 70 year BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 ≤ 40 kg/m2 Normotensive without medication Normal fast plasma glucose level ( ≤120 mg/dL ) Normal kidney function assess serum creatinine blood urea nitrogen Normal liver function assess serum glutamic pyruvic transaminase ( SGPT ) , serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase ( SGOT ) alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) Normal thyroid function define screen TSH within normal range , without medication least 6 month Normal gastrointestinal function 2 . Exclusion criterion : Use supplement contain fish oil lipid supplement ( e.g. , flaxseed , primrose oil , sea buckthorn oil ) within 3 month study participation Greater 2 servings/day combine cheese , wholefat milk wholefat yogurt Diagnosed diabetes mellitus Type I Type II and/or take glucose lower medication ( e.g. , metformin , actos , januvia ) Use medication know affect lipid metabolism ( HMGCoA reductase inhibitor ( statin , red yeast rice ) , bile acid sequestrants , cholesterol absorption inhibitor ( exetimibe [ Zetia ] ) , nicotinic acid agent , fibrates , probucol , anticoagulant , hormone therapy medication contain estrogen , anabolic steroid ) Established major chronic disease major cardiovascular disease ( history myocardial infarction , stroke , symptomatic heart failure , coronary artery bypass graft , symptomatic peripheral arterial disease ) , active cancer , end stage renal disease , dementia , severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , significant liver disease Pregnancy breastfeed Unwillingness adhere study protocol No Social Security number ( payment IRS form ) .
